channel.title: StabbingScape V4.1 [antinull+Syiblocker] make a v5? LOOK!
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]Should i make a v5?????[/size], please comment and tell me if i should or shouldnt. and if it should be czar or delta? base recommendations would be nice. and guys please don't flame. you just make urself look bad. Any suggestions are welcome, thank you :) I am willing to help anyone on coding, i probably dont know much as i used to but i am willing to help :) enjoy guys. [/b]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/m7uv0o.gif[/img]
Credits for source 2% to Scobydoo 28% to me for editing it ;) 30% to tutorials of silabsoft 40% to Figment for base ---------------------------------- Credits for client 20% to me for adding and editing 50% to blurrr for base 30% to bration for some but most of the models ------------------------------
[code] ((commands)) Player commands
::switch ::starter ::home (((((::fly)))) (((((::Jump)))) <----- Cool command lol (((((::jumpoff)))) ::wc ::yell ::food ::dance ::smith ::skills ::rep ::kbd ::mini ::dbmini ::afk ::back ::gsmini ::suggest Many more just do ::commands ~~~~~~ Mod commands
::kick ::notedbarrows ::az ::1hit (((((::mute *user*)))) <----- forgot to add to ::commands -.- (((((::unmute *user*)))) ::pring ::spec ::xrichie ::sweet ::modwear ::pure ::god ::alert ::mypk ::alert ~~~~~~~ Admin commands
::banuser ::unban ::pnpc ::pickup ::npc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::k0 ::xrichie ::god ::adminwear ~~~~~~~~ Owner commands
::ownerwear ::ipban ::staffmeeting ::z0r ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner ::eat ::update ::demote [/code] [code] -------------------I Weed I's Custom Item Id List!-------------------- 9117 Black Mask 9118 Yellow Mask 9106 Null 10103 red Whip 10106 Gold whip 10105 Barrows Whip 10100 Orange whip 10101 Purple whip 10102 Unknown color whip 9091 NUll 10110 Gold Phat 10111 Grey Phat 10109 Orange phat 10117 Dragon Phat 10118 barrows phat 10116 rune Phat 10115 Addy phat 10114 Mith Phat 10113 Steel phat 10112 iron phat 10091 Black Santa Hat 10090 Purple Santa hat 10096 Gold santa hat 10094 Dragon Santa hat 10098 Blue santa hat 10097 barrows santa hat 10093 rune santa hat 10095 addy santa hat 10092 mith santa 1283 DILDO _----------------_ 15150 Summoning Skillcape 16600 Dragon platebody 15114 Ivandis Chainmail 15112 Ivandis Platelegs 15116 Ivandis Sheild 15111 Ivandis helm 15115 Ivandis boots 15113 Ivandis gauntlets 15117 Ivandis blade 15338 lava Chainmail 15339 lava Platelegs 15340 lava sheild 15343 lava helm 15341 lava boots 15342 lava gauntlets 15337 lava blade 8002 Dragon Claws 15603 Beautiful cape 15602 dragon cape 13665 Tri god warspear 13943 energy blades 14396 dragon pickaxe 11115 hidan's scythe 10011 Dragon kite shield (wing shield) 9999 dragon kite shield 10007 Dragon platebody 13459 blue lightsaber 13643 Statius warhammer [/code] What I have done in v4.1 ------------------- *fixed bugs, that was my objective of making this source. *Added ::jump ::jumpoff for players. *Server does contain syiblocker and parts of antinull *added new tele ::chill *added new shops
If anything if someone nulls you, server should reject most of the nulls. It should take a long time for someone to crash you.
Here are some pictures CLient!!! NOTE: NO New CLient for V4.1! --------------- D Claws and d plate, dildo, other stuff on picture! [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/xaa1y.png[/img]
Virus Scan [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5yzqyt.jpg[/img] SOurce! ---------------------
Home created by I weed I [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/ip4ok8.png[/img] Train created by meh! [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2utkcok.jpg[/img] Moar shops! with models so DOWNLOAD CLIENT TO SEE THEM! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2n00ua1.png[/img] Skillcape Emote! (gfx's by i weed i) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2vt2jie.png[/img] Same old Barrows! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2qvh9a8.png[/img] miniquest! got from silabsoft tuts ;) [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/25jcj69.png[/img] New 1v1! [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/1f7ebc.png[/img] FUnPK! Made by me! [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2qi9v6o.png[/img] Bash minigame, only way to get rares [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2v3sl6a.png[/img] SKills! [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/16lwi7p.png[/img] 3rd age [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/214oas6.png[/img] pkbox! [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/27xkuba.png[/img] New chill area [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ia741i.png[/img] Kbd [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1z34i6a.png[/img] Mini Created by i weed i [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/28jd2zk.png[/img] Darkbow Minigame! Not created by me [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/jj5n6g.png[/img] Aggressive Godwars! Created by i weed i [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/w9vc4x.png[/img] This is mylast source FOR SURE!, have fun, and here are teh links, I called v4 my last source but then it was buggy as shit.
--------------------------------------------------------- V4.1 download source link max combat= 126 - http://uppit.com/v/2RBMD9YD ----------------------------------------------------------- V4.1 download source link max combat= 255 - http://uppit.com/v/80E9G523 ------------------------------------------------- V4 Client DOwnload link - http://uppit.com/v/3R90X603
---------If your going to leach please give meh credits ;), and REPLY on topic moar.----- Thank you, I weed I.

item.dc:creator: @zanderrfc zanderrfc
item.description:
@zanderrfc wrote:

[quote=“ruud123, post:194, topic:294022”][quote author=swordblazer8 link=topic=388971.msg2931940#msg2931940 date=1251331148]
for some reason i got 4.1 but i click run and it opens saying “-stabbing scape V4- probably the last source weed shall make” and ive left it like that to “load” for hours on end and it wont work, is there something im missing? or do you just not have the server up right now?
[/quote]
i think that program is the runserver.bat
if it is
then it needs to be loaded forever
then you just open the client click on file then on change ip
then type in it
127.0.0.1
and then you are on your server[/quote]

Dont Grave dig he posted for help nearly a year ago…

Read full topic

item.title: StabbingScape V4.1 [antinull+Syiblocker] make a v5? LOOK!
item.dc:creator: @ruud123 ruud123
item.description:
@ruud123 wrote:

swordblazer8:

for some reason i got 4.1 but i click run and it opens saying “-stabbing scape V4- probably the last source weed shall make” and ive left it like that to “load” for hours on end and it wont work, is there something im missing? or do you just not have the server up right now?

i think that program is the runserver.bat
if it is
then it needs to be loaded forever
then you just open the client click on file then on change ip
then type in it
127.0.0.1
and then you are on your server

Read full topic
